content: 20 sts using the long tail cast on divide the sts evenly on to the dpns if using them place a bor m and join to knit in the round rounds 1-4 *k1 p1* repeat * to * until the end of the round rounds 5-13 knit crown shaping round 14 *k2 k2tog* repeat * to * until the end of the round 15 sts round 15 *k1 k2tog* repeat * to * until the end of the round 10 sts round 16 *k2tog* repeat * to * until the end of the round 5 sts cut yarn thread through remaining sts and fasten_off to the inside of the hat weave in all ends follow the instructions below on how to make a yarn pom pom mini pom pom wrap the yarn around your 3 middle fingers 25-30 times gently slide wrapped yarn off your fingers and place on top of a 20 piece of yarn tie a double knot in the center of the wrapped yarn turn over and tie another double knot with the same yarn piece cut the ends of the loops be careful not to cut the yarn tails trim pom pom use yarn tails to fasten to the top of the inside of the hat see video https //www youtube com/shorts/sk404rp6wcq finishing if this is an ornament loop a piece of yarn through the top of the hat not the pom pom and tie a knot so it can hang from the tree or attach the hat to a piece of twine with a clothes pin to make a cute garland feel free to sell your mini toques in small quantities no wholesale orders and please give credit to my shop fibers and pines each time my design is used please do not sell recreate give away or copy my pattern © 2025 fibers and pines all rights reserved if you need help at any time please email me at hello@fibersandpines com and i will respond as quickly as i can i would love to see your finished hats so please tag me on instagram @fibersandpines and use the hashtag #minitoquepattern thank you so much for choosing my pattern ~ jacey
